original_text: Over the camels was Obil the Ishmaelite; and over the donkeys was Jehdeiah the Meronothite. Over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagrite.
korean_text: 이스마엘 사람 오빌은 낙타를 맡았고 메로놋 사람 예드야는 나귀를 맡았고 하갈 사람 야시스는 양 떼를 맡았으니

sentences.original_text: Over the camels was Obil the Ishmaelite
sentences.korean_translation: 낙타를 책임진 자는 이스마엘 사람 오빌이요

sentences.original_text: and over the donkeys was Jehdeiah the Meronothite
sentences.korean_translation: 나귀를 책임진 자는 메로놋 사람 여드야요

sentences.original_text: Over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagrite
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼를 책임진 자는 하그 사람 야시스였더라
